[Female Kamael Warrior Class Transfer]:
A female Kamael Warrior who has reached level 20 may change her class to a Warder. A character may undertake the class transfer quest at level 18; if successful, they will be able to use more specialized and powerful skills than before. In order to become a Warder, you must first meet Master Sione. Master Sione can be found in Gludin Village. Go and seek her out.
Close Window.
